title: Life Satisfaction Wheel
description: Rate your satisfaction across 8 key life areas to see where you stand today

dimensions.label: Career & Work
dimensions.description: Your job satisfaction, professional growth, and sense of purpose at work

dimensions.label: Finances
dimensions.description: Your financial stability, savings, and relationship with money

dimensions.label: Health & Fitness
dimensions.description: Your physical health, energy levels, and wellness habits

dimensions.label: Relationships
dimensions.description: Your romantic relationship, family bonds, and close friendships

dimensions.label: Fun & Recreation
dimensions.description: Your hobbies, leisure time, and activities that bring you joy

dimensions.label: Physical Environment
dimensions.description: Your living space, surroundings, and sense of comfort at home

dimensions.label: Personal Growth
dimensions.description: Your learning, self-development, and pursuit of new experiences

dimensions.label: Contribution
dimensions.description: How you give back, help others, and make a positive impact
